org.magnos.asset.server
Class BaseAssetServer

java.lang.Object
  org.magnos.asset.server.BaseAssetServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, AssetServer
Direct Known Subclasses:
MulticastServer, TcpServer, UdpServer
public abstract class BaseAssetServer
extends Object
implements AssetServer, Runnable

An abstract implementation of an AssetServer.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

Constructor Summary
BaseAssetServer()
          Instantiates a new BaseAssetServer.
 
Method Summary
 void add(AssetServerListener listener)
          Adds the AssetServerListener to this AssetServer.
 void clear()
          Removes all AssetServerListeners from this AssetServer.
 AssetSource getSource()
          Returns the AssetSource the server is using to retrieve assets.
 Thread getThread()
          Returns the thread thats running the AssetServer.
 void remove(AssetServerListener listener)
          Removes the given AssetServerListener from this AssetServer.
 void run()
          Runs the asset server until stop() is invoked or the implementation throws an Exception during the onExecute invocation.
 void setSource(AssetSource source)
          Sets the AssetSource the server is using to retrieve assets.
 void start()
          Starts the server for business by binding, starting the server thread, waiting for the server to finish binding, and waiting for the server thread to finish starting.
 void stop()
          Stops the asset server.
 void triggerError(Exception e, boolean expected)
          Triggers the AssetServerListener.onServerError(AssetServer, Exception, boolean) on all listeners.
 void triggerRequest(String request)
          Triggers the AssetServerListener.onAssetRequest(AssetServer, String) on all listeners.
 void triggerResponse(String request, InputStream response)
          Triggers the AssetServerListener.onAssetResponse(AssetServer, String, InputStream) on all listeners.
